fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Isolate a player each night, causing all good faction visits (except for direct attacks) to fail against that player.
- Once per game, call Daybreak during the day. For the rest of that day, players may not use any day abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Evil roles that visit an Isolated target will learn that a Starspawn attempted to prevent their visit.
- You learn all roles that visit or attempt to visit your target.
- You may isolate yourself.
- **Ethereal Defense** - Your defense only applies to Evil and Neutral factions. Good faction roles ignore your defense, unless you gain defense by other means.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
